overview: The third episode of the successful Adventures On The Lust Boat series is here. Multi-awarded director Ettore Buchi brings us another exciting movie crammed with filthy and hardcore action. Buchi has personally hand picked the sluttiest stars from Europe and America, like Brooklyn Lee, Honey Demon, Jayleen Fox or Natalie Von for your wanking pleasure.
title: Adventures on the Lust Boat 3
